meanings.definition: A person or thing that formats something.
meanings.sent1: The formatters at the printing company ensure all documents are properly formatted.
meanings.sent2: I downloaded a new formatter to help me organize my files more efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The formatters at the party were the ones responsible for setting up the decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous attention to detail made her the best formatter in the office.
meanings.sent5: The formatters in the library meticulously arranged the books by genre and author.

meanings.definition: A software tool used to format data or text.
meanings.sent1: I used a formatter to make the text bold and italic in my document.
meanings.sent2: The new formatter plugin made it easier to align the images in the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The formatter on my computer crashed right when I needed to finalize the report.
meanings.sent4: The formatter function in the software allowed me to customize the layout of the webpage.
meanings.sent5: With the help of the formatter, I was able to neatly organize the data in the spreadsheet.

meanings.definition: The process of arranging or organizing something in a specific way.
meanings.sent1: The formatter of the event planned the seating arrangement meticulously.
meanings.sent2: Proper formatter of the code is essential for the program to run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The formatter of the closet made sure all the clothes were color-coordinated.
meanings.sent4: Her unique formatter of the garden made it a peaceful and harmonious space.
meanings.sent5: The formatter of the schedule ensured that all tasks were allocated efficiently.
